knimeNode.name: RawReadManipulatorStatisticMerger
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node can be used to merge statistics of the RawReadManipulator node.

fullDescription.intro: This node can be used to merge the mapping statistics of multiple RawReadManipulator runs into one file in order to post-process that data.

option.name: path to folder with RawReadManipulator Outputs

fullDescription.option: The node searches recursively all folders and sub-folders of the input directory for output files of a RawReadManipulator run.
Output files with the name of each selected module will be created there.
Modules for which the data should be merged must be selected here. At least one module must be selected.

ports.outPort:
Cell 0: name of module
Cell 1: path to the merged file
Cell 0: path to the RawReadManipulator output files which were merged
